pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use a $(thing)Combustion Machine$(), place ingredients in the top, place fuel in the bottom, and light the opening in the bottom with a $(l:appendix/ignition)verified fire-starting device$().$(p)$(info) $(thing)Combustion Machines$() can be doused with a bucket of water to save fuel.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text: $(info) Regarding automation, input ingredients are inserted into the top, or top sides, of the device, fuel is inserted into the bottom sides, and output items are extracted from the bottom.
